seniority_level.evidence: 1-5 years experience required, title is 'Software & Data Engineer' without senior/staff designation, suggesting mid-level role

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly includes 'Data Engineer', responsibilities focus on data pipelines, ontology, and integrations within Palantir Foundry

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on Palantir Foundry platform which is primarily a data integration and analytics platform, with emphasis on data pipelines and ontology objects for structured data management

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people management, mentoring, or technical leadership responsibilities; role focuses on collaboration and implementation within a team

primary_cloud.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned in job posting or Pass 1 extraction; Palantir Foundry can be deployed on-prem or cloud but no specific cloud is referenced

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned at all in the job posting

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on data pipelines, integrations, and ontology within Foundry suggests batch processing; no real-time/streaming technologies mentioned

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestrator tools mentioned (Airflow, Dagster, etc.) in job posting or Pass 1 extraction

storage_layer.evidence: No specific storage technologies (warehouse, lake, lakehouse) mentioned beyond Palantir Foundry platform

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Berthoud, CO with onsite work model; implies must be in Colorado region

timezone_focus.evidence: US citizenship/residency required and location in Colorado, indicating US-specific focus

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite work model in Berthoud, CO with no remote option mentioned; implies relocation may be required if not already in area

h1b_friendly.evidence: Explicitly states 'US Citizenship or Permanent Residency' required; no mention of visa sponsorship

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Work authorization requirement (citizenship/permanent residency) implies no student visa support

citizenship_required.evidence: Explicitly states 'US CITIZENSHIP, PERMANENT RESIDENCY, REFUGEE OR ASYLUM STATUS IS REQUIRED' - citizenship is the first and most restrictive option listed

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time exempt position with comprehensive benefits including equity grants, indicating W2 employee status

benefits_level.evidence: Includes unlimited PTO, equity grants, parental leave, multiple insurance options, and retirement plans - exceeds standard benefits package

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'exciting challenges' and 'supportive team' but no specific career tracks, promotion paths, or advancement opportunities described

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions collaboration with Product Owner and other Software & Data Engineers, suggesting learning from experienced team members

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotions, advancement, or career progression in the job posting

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring different roles within the company

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned in the job posting

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between required (1-5 years, Palantir Foundry) and desired (manufacturing/IoT systems) qualifications, with some flexibility implied by 'we encourage anyone who believes they have the skills'

scope_definition.evidence: Focused role on Palantir Foundry development with specific responsibilities around data pipelines, ontology, and integrations; not a multi-role hybrid position

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements (1-5 years experience, Palantir Foundry) are reasonable for a mid-level data engineer role; no unrealistic skill combinations or senior requirements for junior position
